QueryResult.text: select apmaster.id odf_pk, APMASTER.ID as vendor_key, apmaster.VENDOR_CODE as vendor_id, apmaster.ADDRESS_NAME as vendor_name, apmaster.STATUS_TYPE as vendor_status_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'LOOKUP_FIN_VENDOR_STATUS_TYPE' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_ENUM = apmaster.STATUS_TYPE) as status_caption, APMASTER.created_date as clarity_created_date, APMASTER.last_updated_date as clarity_updated_date, dataw_context.language_code, dataw_context.id language_id from apmaster apmaster inner join cmn_languages dataw_context on dataw_context.id = dataw_context.id where 1 = 1 and dataw_context.is_dw_enabled=1
